Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: Since only a small subset of my triggers are things I actually have control over whether I encounter,  way I look at it for myself is more...’how do I handle the distress that arises when I encounter a trigger?’ For me that tends to be an array of distraction and self-soothing activities, or reaching out to a support person. I keep a list of my go-to wellness tools on my phone for quick reference, since my brain isn’t too good at thinking clearly when I’m in distress.
